1D766DB0.VoiceDir1.BAE4: Cautious--interacting with a wild wolf. Don't know if they are a friend or enemy yet.

2220BEF2.VoiceDir3.BAE4: Hint of hopefulness--maybe this wolf can help us

25FCB2F0.VoiceDir17.15481B: Wolf sniffs at the Player, trying to decide whether they are friend or foe.

4D79092E.VoiceDir15.15481B: Wolf is suspicious of this outsider--are they a Knight Penitent?

D4479923.Line1.BAE4: Easy, my friend. I’m not one of the Knights.

D8F1EA65.Line3.BAE4: I’m looking for your master, Nafain. Think you could help me with that?
